# GitHub Configuration

This directory contains GitHub-specific configuration files for the Godot Online Subsystem repository.

## Contents

### Issue Templates (`ISSUE_TEMPLATE/`)
- **feature.yml**: Template for user-facing feature requests
- **task.yml**: Template for development team-facing tasks
- **bug.yml**: Template for bug reports
- **config.yml**: Configuration for issue template chooser

### Workflows (`workflows/`)
- **add-to-project.yml**: Automatically adds issues and PRs to the project board

### Documentation
- **WORKFLOW_SETUP.md**: Detailed setup instructions for project board integration

## Quick Links

- [Issue Types and Usage](../CONTRIBUTING.md#issue-types)
- [Project Board Setup](WORKFLOW_SETUP.md)
- [Contributing Guidelines](../CONTRIBUTING.md)

## For Maintainers

If you're setting up this repository for the first time or need to configure the project board integration, see [WORKFLOW_SETUP.md](WORKFLOW_SETUP.md) for complete instructions.
